title: How to Boost Your Productivity with Text Expansion apps: Productivity Tuesday Ep#6
tags: Phrase Express - Text Expansion for Windows
description:
Welcome to another episode of productivity Tuesday. Today, we'll see how to use Text Expansion apps to boost productivity. 

[Download links and useful resouces]

MacOS  - https://www.trankynam.com/atext/
Windows - http://www.phraseexpress.com/download.php 
Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.isaiasmatewos.texpand&hl=en
iOS - https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/autotext-text-expander-phraseexpress/id926194820?mt=8
